Abilities: You may choose one person during the day to jail for the night.

Attributes:
-You may anonymously talk with your prisoner.
-You may choose to execute your prisoner.
-The jailed target cannot perform their night ability.
-While jailed, the prisoner is immune to all attacks.

Goal: Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

Special Attributes: Unique Role, Ignores Night Immunity, Roleblocking

Note(s):
-You cannot execute on the first night.
-You cannot execute more than 3 targets.
-You may not execute your target if roleblocked.
-Two Jailors can occur in one game, although it is a Unique Role.
-If a Witch controls you into targeting your prisoner, you will be forced to execute them.
-If you jail a Serial Killer, they will kill you if you don\'t execute them. A bodyguard can protect you from this, though.
-A jailed target is protected from an Arsonist igniting and dousing.
-A jailed target is also protected from a Blackmailer\'s blackmail.
-Click on the Sun Icon during the day phase to select a person to jail that night.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Not Suspicious
Investigator - Your target is a protector. They must be a Bodyguard, Jailor, or a Lookout.
Consigliere - Your target detains people at night. They must be a Jailor.

Win Conditions:
Must kill all Mafia
Must kill Serial Killer
Must kill Arsonist
Win kill Werewolves
Wins with Survivors
Wins with Town

Abilities: Decide if you will go on alert at night.

Attributes:
-While on alert you can not be killed at night.
-If anyone visits you while you are on alert they will be shot.
-You are immune to role blocks.
-You only have 3 alerts.
-Special Attributes: Unique Role, Ignores Night Immunity, Roleblock Immune

Note(s):
-If someone who visits you gets healed by a doctor, they will not die.
-If a Transporter transports you, the Transporter will die but the transport will still occur.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Not Suspicious
Investigator - Your target works with weapons. They must be a Veteran, Vigilante, or Mafioso.
Consigliere - Your target is a paranoid war hero. They must be a Veteran.

Win Conditions:
Must kill all Mafia
Must kill Serial Killer
Must kill Arsonist
Win kill Werewolves
Wins with Survivors
Wins with Town

Abilities: Choose to take justice into your own hands and shoot someone.

Attributes:
-If you shoot another town member you will commit suicide over the guilt.
-You can not shoot night 1.
-You have only 3 bullets.
-Your attack does not ignore Night Immunity.

Goal: Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

Note(s):
-You may shoot night 1 if you are controlled by a witch.
-If you die the same night you shoot a town member it will also say you died of guilt.
-You can be killed by a Bodyguard.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Not Suspicious
Investigator - Your target works with weapons. They must be a Veteran, Vigilante, or Mafioso.
Consigliere - Your target will bend the law to enact justice. They must be a Vigilante.

Win Conditions:
Must kill all Mafia
Must kill Serial Killer
Must kill Arsonist
Win kill Werewolves
Wins with Survivors
Wins with Town

Abilities: Check for Vampires each night.

Attributes:
-If you find a Vampire you will stake them in the heart.
-If a Vampire visits you they will be staked.
-You can hear the Vampires talk at night.
-If you kill all Vampires you will become a Vigilante.

Goal: Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

Note(s):
-If there is a Vampire Hunter, there will always be at least one Vampire at the start of the game.
-If a vampire visits you at night you will not be turned into a Vampire, but instead you will kill them.
-Once all Vampires are dead you will become a Vigilante, but you will only have 1 bullet instead of 3.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Not Suspicious
Investigator - You target takes charge. They could be a Mayor, Godfather, or Vampire Hunter
Consigliere - Your target tracks Vampires. They must be a Vampire Hunter.

Win Conditions:
Must kill all Mafia
Must kill Serial Killer
Must kill Arsonist
Win kill Werewolves
Wins with Survivors
Wins with Town
